'''I Hear Thunder...''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to be struck by a [[Crackling Axe Mitachurl]]'s thunder attack.

==Gameplay Notes==
* This attack pattern is possible when a Crackling Axe Mitachurl is in a thunderstorm with the wet status.
* This can also be obtained easily in the Domain of Mastery: Thundering Valley I ([[Violet Court]]).
